MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH44 postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Manor Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.41pm. Our engineers are on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.24pm on 28th of Jan 2021
